name: Acidium
description:
Experience Alex's life

Engage in various novel events between Alex and her boyfriend. Deal deep into what can relationships became and let yourself look into mind of someone with particular life.

Features
  • Relieve your stress via rogue like features
  • Experience engaging story
  • Combine story elements with rogue like combat
Team
  • Story + Programing: Erika Vyslouzilova
  • Art: Erika Hornakova, Jana Kilianova
  • Programing: Lukas Kopacka
  • Programing: Vaclav Muller

Post LD update

We deployed broken game durring LD and since we did not want to leave here broken game we decided to do small update. Here is list of changes that we did post LD (Build submited durring Ld is also avaible with [Original] tag.

  • Continue (from save game) did not work and crashed game
  • Score to finish level was set to 1 instead of desired numbers
  • Chainsaw had hitbox behind itself instead of on image
  • Player was shooting from feet instead of weapon
  • We also Added Mac + Linux build since adding platforms is permited
